document.full_text: foreign troops killed an afghan child and wounded four others when responding to insurgent fire in volatile eastern kunar province, the provincial governor said on monday, the third accidental killing of young civilians in less than a week.
document.title: afghan governor says nato troops killed child
lines_and_colors: foreign troops killed an afghan child and wounded four others when responding to insurgent fire in volatile eastern kunar province, the provincial governor said on monday, the third accidental killing of young civilians in less than a week.
